faq.a1: Each Estruturart Golden (ESG) token is backed by 1 gram of certified physical gold, stored in regulated institutional custody. The backing is regularly audited.
faq.a2: Yes, under specific conditions and through the authorized primary desk. Consult the full documentation for redemption procedures.
